org.treetank.service.xml.serialize

Class StAXSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.service.xml.serialize.StAXSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator, XMLEventReader

    public final class StAXSerializer
extends Object
implements XMLEventReader

    StAXSerializer

    Provides a StAX implementation (event API) for retrieving a Treetank database.

    Author:
    Johannes Lichtenberger, University of Konstanz

    • Constructor Detail

      • StAXSerializer

        public StAXSerializer(AbsAxis paramAxis,
              INodeReadTrx pRtx)
        Initialize XMLStreamReader implementation with transaction. The cursor points to the node the XMLStreamReader starts to read. Do not serialize the tank ids.
        Parameters:
        paramAxis - AbsAxis which is used to iterate over and generate StAX events.

      • StAXSerializer

        public StAXSerializer(AbsAxis paramAxis,
              INodeReadTrx pRtx,
              boolean paramCloseRtx)
        Initialize XMLStreamReader implementation with transaction. The cursor points to the node the XMLStreamReader starts to read. Do not serialize the tank ids.
        Parameters:
        paramAxis - AbsAxis which is used to iterate over and generate StAX events.
        paramCloseRtx - Determines if rtx should be closed afterwards.
